title: Club Management
body:
Been having this issue for exactly a month now.

Leader of my Club, Filthy Casuals (There may or may not be other letters in there.. replacing L's..) IL| < upper : lower > il\
However I'm the only one unable to see my club.
My real life friend is able to see me online in friends list, however I appear offline in the club, and am still ranked as Leader.

Xikini - Leader
Bloody Werewolf - Captain/vice (not sure what it's called)
Misty Fierce - I'm not sure if I promoted or not.. pretty sure I did.
few other randoms added.

I sent a support ticket on Oct 28th, and was advised to wait.
Sent a support ticket regarding another inquiry on Nov 13th, but added in another shout-out for the club issue just in case.. but no resolution.

The Stickied post has been down for a few days or so.. and still no resolution.

I can send logs like I did the first time if needed.
I can attempt a backflip in real life, however I may be unable to return to my computer after that.

Please Rito, just some help with this issue.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
We've resolved most of the Clubs issues for club owners. For the few that are still experiencing issues, we recommend writing in a new [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can resolve this together.

Let me know if you have any questions!
